content.text: Learn how to create a full screen video background with CSS.
content.html: Learn how to create a full screen video background with CSS.

content.text: Learn how to create a full screen video background that covers the entire browser window:
content.html: Learn how to create a full screen video background that covers the entire browser window:

content.text: How To Create a Fullscreen Video

syntaxHighlighting.text: <!-- Optional: some overlay text to describe the video -->
<!-- Use a button to pause/play the video with JavaScript -->

content.code:
Heading

 

Lorem ipsum...

syntax_highlighting.text: <!-- Optional: some overlay text to describe the video -->
<!-- Use a button to pause/play the video with JavaScript -->

content.code_html:
<!-- The video -->
<video autoplay muted loop id="myVideo">
  <source src="rain.mp4" type="video/mp4">
</video>

<!-- Optional: some overlay text to describe the video -->
<div class="content">
  <h1>Heading</h1>
  <p>Lorem ipsum...</p>
  <!-- Use a button to pause/play the video with JavaScript -->
  <button id="myBtn" onclick="myFunction()">Pause</button>
</div>

<!-- Use a button to pause/play the video with JavaScript -->

syntaxHighlighting.text: /* Style the video: 100% width and height to cover the entire window */
/* Add some content at the bottom of the video/page */

position: fixed;  bottom: 0;  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);  color: #f1f1f1;
    width: 100%;  padding: 20px;
/* Style the button used to pause/play the video */

syntax_highlighting.text: /* Style the video: 100% width and height to cover the entire window */
/* Add some content at the bottom of the video/page */

position: fixed;  bottom: 0;  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);  color: #f1f1f1;
    width: 100%;  padding: 20px;
/* Style the button used to pause/play the video */

content.code_html:
/* Style the video: 100% width and height to cover the entire window */
#myVideo {
  position: fixed;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  min-width: 100%;
  min-height: 100%;
}

/* Add some content at the bottom of the video/page */
.content {
  position: fixed;
  bottom: 0;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
  color: #f1f1f1;
  width: 100%;
  padding: 20px;
}

/* Style the button used to pause/play the video */
#myBtn {
  width: 200px;
  font-size: 18px;
  padding: 10px;
  border: none;
  background: #000;
  color: #fff;
  cursor: pointer;
}

#myBtn:hover {
  background: #ddd;
  color: black;
}

syntax_highlighting_data.text: /* Style the video: 100% width and height to cover the entire window */
/* Add some content at the bottom of the video/page */

position: fixed;  bottom: 0;  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);  color: #f1f1f1;
    width: 100%;  padding: 20px;
/* Style the button used to pause/play the video */

content.text: Optionally, you can add JavaScript to pause/play the video with a click of a button:
content.html: Optionally, you can add JavaScript to pause/play the video with a click of a button:

syntaxHighlighting.text:
// Pause and play the 
  video, and change the button text

content.code:
<script>// Get the videovar video = document.getElementById("myVideo");
// Get the buttonvar
btn = document.getElementById("myBtn");// Pause and play the
video, and change the button textfunction myFunction() {  if (video.paused)
{    video.play();    btn.innerHTML = "Pause";  } else {    video.pause();
btn.innerHTML = "Play";  }}</script>

syntax_highlighting.text:
// Pause and play the 
  video, and change the button text

content.code_html:
<script>
// Get the video
var video = document.getElementById("myVideo");

// Get the button
var btn = document.getElementById("myBtn");

// Pause and play the video, and change the button text
function myFunction() {
  if (video.paused) {
    video.play();
    btn.innerHTML = "Pause";
  } else {
    video.pause();
    btn.innerHTML = "Play";
  }
}
</script>

syntax_highlighting_data.text:
// Pause and play the 
  video, and change the button text
